title.en: Anhui: Moving Forward on Medical Path, Building Hope Together

subtitle.zh: 血友病患者医学教育助力项目培训会
subtitle.en: Hemophilia Patient Medical Education Support Project Training Conference

description.zh: 借助潜山市汇爱罕见病助残关爱中心开展的「医路前行·共筑希望」血友病患者医学教育助力项目第二期培训会议，血友姐妹会负责人左钰洁以《女性血友病携带者为何也会患血友病？解密基因表达》为题作线上分享。这次分享深入浅出地解释了女性血友病的发病机制，为安徽地区的患者和家属提供了专业的科普教育。
description.en: Through the second phase training conference of the 'Moving Forward on Medical Path, Building Hope Together' hemophilia patient medical education support project conducted by Qianshan Huiai Rare Disease Disability Care Center, Yujie (Ruby) Zuo, leader of the Hemophilia Sisters team, gave an online presentation titled 'Why Do Female Hemophilia Carriers Also Develop Hemophilia? Decoding Gene Expression'. This presentation explained the pathogenesis of female hemophilia in an accessible way, providing professional popular science education for patients and families in the Anhui region.
